name: Carrot Shooter
description:
During the process of making this game, I wanted to try out a form of rogue-like space faring game, where the main character, which is the bunny, tries to travel around planets and collect carrots. Alas, I did not have enough time and was unable to implement many of the features that I wanted. 

I really learned a lot during my first Godot Game Jam Experience and even as my first Godot game project. I hope that if you try out my game, you will enjoy it and have some fun!

Music from Cheel | Sunday Rain:
